actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To prevent governmental entities from using tax-exempt financing to engage in unfair competition against private enterprise.

summary.text: Private Enterprise Protection Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to prohibit the classification as a "private activity bond" of any bond from which more than the lesser of five percent of the proceeds or $1 million will be used to finance the construction, rehabilitation, or expansion of a "disqualified facility." Defines such facility.

titles.title: To prevent governmental entities from using tax-exempt financing to engage in unfair competition against private enterprise.
